comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: pennylrichardsca: This does appear to be automobile engineer Howard Earle Coffin. This article from the New Georgia Encyclopedia has some photos of him and more information: www.georgiaencyclopedia.org/nge/Article.jsp?id=h-863 We will add some details to the description.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Howard Coffin, a graduate of the University of Michigan, here in my hometown of Ann Arbor,  was a founder and the first vice-president of the Hudson Motor Car Co. of Detroit.
